overview:
Development within Radian6 is led by Jerry Carr, VP of Engineering. As Vice President of Engineering, Jerry has over 15 years experience in the fields of system architecture, design and development, specifically in the areas of web-based service delivery, enterprise application integration (EAI), and next generation IP-based application development. His technical experience spans numerous technologies, including Java/J2EE, Microsoft.NET Framework, EAI Message Brokers, Web Services, and Web 2.0 technologies.

Previously, Jerry was development manager and system architect for T4G, a technology consulting company. Jerry has also held various technical leadership and Director level positions during his career with various companies, including Alcatel Canada, iMagicTV, and NBTel.
